CHAT.comment: REED ELSEVIER, INC., ET AL. Petitioners v. IRVIN MUCHNICK, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:07 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CHARLES S. SIMS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GINGER ANDERS ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DEBORAH JONES MERRITT AS AMICUS CURIAE IN SUPPORT OF THE JUDGEMENT BELOW
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CHARLES S. SIMS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:08 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
